questions.text: What was the color of the dress Brooke wore to the parent's wedding?

questions.explanation:
Mike.

	He's the most boring character on the show!

questions.text: What did the girls play when the guys locked them in the bathroom?
questions.correct: truth or dare & Truth or Dare & Truth Or Dare
questions.explanation:
truth or dare & Truth or Dare & Truth Or Dare.

	Their darkest secrets were revealed on this episode!

questions.text: What is Sugar Daddy's real name?
questions.explanation:
Michael.

	No one ever calls him this anymore.

questions.text: True or False: Brooke was wrongfully accused of taking drugs.
questions.explanation:
true.

	Yup, framed by the school's very own 'Manazon', though it was untrue that she really took drugs.

questions.text: Which character is against disecting frogs in biology?
questions.explanation:
Lilly.

	Lilly even has to use 'cruelty free' eyeliner!

questions.text: True or False: Brooke went to the dance with Josh, and Sam went to the dance with Harrison.
questions.explanation:
false.

	Nope, it was the other way around. Harrison asked Brooke, so to get back at Brooke and Harrison, Josh asked Sam.

questions.text: What state is Mary Cherry from?
Sam beats Brooke in a modeling contest to become what?
questions.explanation:
the next Power Girl.

	Brooke was devastated.

options: she was the president of the international Hanson fan club
questions.explanation:
she was once fat.

	This enabled Kennedy High to have their first Manazon on the cheerleading squad.
